sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { Flex, Heading, Input, Button, FormControl, FormLabel, Switch, useColorMode, useColorModeValue, } from '@chakra-ui/react'; import './form.css' function Form() { const { toggleColorMode } = useColorMode(); const formBackground = useColorModeValue('gray.300', 'gray.700','purple.500'); return ( Login Нэвтрэх нэр Нууц үг {/* Enable Dark Mode? */} ) } export default Form
